author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Antero Midstream Says Entered Into Senior Secured Credit Facility Consisting Of $12 Mln Credit Commitment
text:
May 14 (Reuters) - Antero Midstream GP LP:
* ANTERO MIDSTREAM GP LP SAYS ON MAY 9, ENTERED INTO A SENIOR SECURED CREDIT FACILITY CONSISTING OF A $12 MILLION CREDIT COMMITMENT - SEC FILING Source bit.ly/2jUbaH4 Further company coverage:
